greeting_3: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer
description_1: I turn coffee into code... My name is Saddam (people call me Sam) and I am a graduate from Sejong university in Seoul and a software engineer with a great experience in web development and have a really good background on modern web development tools.
description_2: Finished 4 month internship and managed front-end development of the company`s leading projects. Have been working with the back-end engineering team and developing complex systems using variety of modern software
description_3: Handled backend development + front end of the company`s leading projects. Learned solidity and solidity development tools for blockchain interaction. Sending tokens, managing smart contracts, connecting different wallets to the website and talking to blockchain networks.
description_4: Working here as a full stack software engineer and a blockchain developer. Created various services using latest software in the blockchain environment. One of my main achievements here was building a bridge between two blockchain networks.
description_5: Designed and implemented a highly available (99% uptime), scalable microservice architecture powering multi-modal AI APIs (STT, TTS, LLM, Image, Video), serving hundreds of requests daily. Participated in an on-prem delivery of our companyâ€™s services by setting up the hardware (Custom servers with Nvidia H100, H200 GPUs) and software (Custom trained LLMs, Private/Local Cloud, Datacenter setup). Fine tune and train LLMs to generate responses that 100% fit requirements of our customers. Developed custom RAG that processes text data retrieved (using OCR) from (pdf/word/text) files, splits data into chunks, creates embeddings and stores embeddings + chunk text + metadata in a vector DB (used ChromaDB). Developed a custom database agentic retrieval system (NL2SQL) that transforms raw user queries into sql queries using LLM (qwen-8B) and returns polished results to user.
location: From Uzbekistan, living in Seoul, South Korea
education: The bachelor`s degree in Business administration and Computer Science as a double major from Sejong University in Seoul, South Korea
keep_in_touch: Keep in touch with me in social media
pr_desc_1: I developed the whole project with frontend, backend and designed the smart contract that enables users transfer their crypto from one network to another
pr_desc_3: Food search and recipe finder website that uses real-time API to fetch data from
pr_desc_2: Fully custom LLMs running locally with the help of Nvidia H100 GPU. Running quantized models, like gpt-oss-20b, aya-expanse-8b, qwen-8b.
pr_desc_4: News website that feeds the latest news from a real-time API
pr_desc_5: Solidity smart contract which disburses ERC20 tokens linearly, over a specific period of time
pr_desc_6: Fully offline transcription and translation tool with speaker diarization and audio denoising features. Used openai/whisper-large-v3-turbo models for transcription and aya-expanse-8b model for translation.
